item.title: Python
item.description: Rating: 15.63% Summary Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation. Links: https://www.python.org/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language) https://www.python.org/about/gettingstarted/
